sqlMap.statement: SELECT LIFECYCLCLSNAME AS "LIFECYCLCLSNAME", LODINSEQ AS "LODINSEQ", LIFECYCLUSEDSTCD AS "LIFECYCLUSEDSTCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP04 WHERE LifeCyclClsName = #lifeCyclClsName#
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIBP04 SET LodinSeq = #lodinSeq#, LifeCyclUseDstcd = #lifeCyclUseDstcd# WHERE LifeCyclClsName = #lifeCyclClsName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIBP04 ( LifeCyclClsName, LodinSeq, LifeCyclUseDstcd ) VALUES ( #lifeCyclClsName#, #lodinSeq#, #lifeCyclUseDstcd# )
